title: the mute yasuo option
body:
so ive accepted yasuo will be in everygame, but really do i have to listen to hasagi every 3 seconds can we get a mute yasuo option that mutes yasuo sounds when vsing him in lane.

by the way this is a joke, (talon12 heres looking at you before you comment on this thread with some yasuo cuckery{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}} )

replies.body: I love how Talon12 has just become the novelty 'Crazy Yasuo Man'.

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=L44oY42b,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-08-12T12:32:39.977+0000)
>
> I love how Talon12 has just become the novelty 'Crazy Yasuo Man'.

aint complaining, I will protect what is being treated unjustly.

Pity you're the only one who sees it that way.
Im assuming you think the incoming nerfs are unjust as well?

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=L44oY42b,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-08-13T04:16:05.515+0000)
>
> Pity you're the only one who sees it that way.
> Im assuming you think the incoming nerfs are unjust as well?

not saying they aren't but they are directly aimed at tank yasuo, you people are complaining about nothing but the full ad yasuo's and his "bs broken damage"

And one of the things they are thinking about doing  is lowering his q base damage to help nullify it on tank builds, but slightly upping crit reduction so it doesnt affect full ad. Which im sure you would love

"You people"? What are you on?

I think it's good that there nerfing tank Yasuo, he is a damage dealer, and thus by definition should be squishy.

"Sure I would love"? You sure make a whole lot of assumptions based on a whole lotta nothing,

A lot of people complain about Yasuo (for whatever reason) and that must mean is something is off about that champion somewhere along the line (it might not be the thing they are complaining about) but you can't say that he is healthy when a large percentage of the population are unhappy with him.

If more people are unhappy than happy, then who is right? The few people who say he ok, or the large amount of people who say he isn't?

Logic mate. Logic.

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=L44oY42b,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2016-08-13T14:03:08.537+0000)
>
> thus by definition should be squishy.


He is a fighter. Maybe you should check his champ page first idiot.

The definition of fighter in this game is tanky with damage, not to be a squishy damage dealer

Not my fault people decided to build assassin instead of his intended role, and now people finally build his intended role riot wants to nerf it

>Which im sure you would love

Learn sarcasm. 

____

And how the hell are you so thick as to not realise, by nerfing fighter yasuo, they need to give assassin yasuo a slight buff, and for the past 3 years, assassin yasuo has been the complaint, not fighter. AAs such, this "nerf" would only bring more complaining, its like what they did to ekko, nerf base stats, give boost to scaling, meaning scaling does more damage ,and in the long run the scaling does more than the base.

____

This "tank yasuo" nerf wont do anything but make people complain harder about what they have been complaining about for 3 years, and thats assassin yasuo, he will do about 5-10% more damage with the current proposed change

You said yourself in an earlier post 
_"he's basically an adc that's melee, get used to it."_

He certianly deals adc level damage, the thing about a fighter is that they have damage and tankiness, BUT they have less damage than a carry, and less tankiness than a tank. For Yasuo at least the former is not the case.

No champion should have adc level damage, AND be difficult to kill.

Also I never said he wasn't a fighter, I said he was a damage dealer, which is true, he deals damage, and he takes up the position of the mid lane carry. (Which is almost always a damage position) so when In a team, he composes much of the damage. 

No it's not your fault that people build assassin, but it's also not your fault that people use guns to kill eachother when they aren't supposed to, should we not have gun laws just because a guns primary role is not to go into schools and kill everyone?

Sarcasm only makes sense if it relates to the point you are making, yours had no point at all.

What it all boils down to in he end, is that more people will agree with me that Yasuo is unbalanced, than will agree with you. You are fighting a losing battle.

Everyone on the boards (probably riot included) just knows that you're only defending yasuo because he's your little pet champ and you want to feel special playing him, but you can't because everyone else also plays him. So instead of accepting that like everyone else does, you come here and try to make out like all other yasuos are bad, and you're the only one that can play him properly. 

and it's getting pretty tiring.

and he is a melee adc, thats how everyone has always built him, I'm just saying his intended role was that of a fighter.

And where is this "difficult" to kill yasuo never ever been a problem, easy kills easy wins, then again, 90% of this community have an obvious mental issue that prevents them from thinking more than 1/10 steps in strategy, so that it the likely culprit.

And as for this little shit post 

>Everyone on the boards (probably riot included) just knows that you're only defending yasuo because he's your little pet champ and you want to feel special playing him, but you can't because everyone else also plays him. So instead of accepting that like everyone else does, you come here and try to make out like all other yasuos are bad, and you're the only one that can play him properly.

I don't even use him. Im just stating facts, they are just crap. Only ever seen 4 good yasuo's in my life, rest fed their tiny little asses off thinking they were playing the easy op champ, he is like riven, mechanics get you fed, if you get fed you need to rely less on those mechanics, but in the end its still the mechanics, only difference is riven outclasses him in nearly every area.

Don't worry, humans are naturally stupid creatures with a need of violence, you can't help it. You just need to find something to attack to let it all, as is your natural instinct.

Graves' intended role is adc, but now he is for some reason more of a jungler. That doesn't mean they shouldn't nerf his jungling, just because he isn't meant to be a jungler.

You know, if you think one way and everyone else thinks the other way (90% of the community) its more likely that you are wrong, not them. Logic.

Well your profile shows that you have 12000 points on Yasuo (80000, higher than your 2nd most played champ) and that the is one of your most played champs in ranked also.

So tell me again how you don't even use him?

When you talk about humans, you talk as if you don't count yourself among us?

> You know, if you think one way and everyone else thinks the other way (90% of the community) its more likely that you are wrong, not them. Logic.


Never said they think different things, I said they think only a part of what they should be thinking, instead of going the full way with their train of thought, they stop just after they start. 

Say there are 10 questions, similar to each other and there 10 ways to answer those questions, and the more ways you do it the more accurate the answer will be, instead of using a different way each time, they would use the same way, with the most inaccurate result.

Or say chess, instead of thinking their strategy through multiple different ways, taking account for as many situations as they can and multiple steps ahead, they would just pick up a piece and do the first thing they saw without thinking it through, only looking so far as one situation, one strategy and one step, ultimately losing because they couldn't ​be stuffed to think a little.

As quoted by Andrew Smith; “People fear what they don't understand and hate what they can't conquer.”

Congrats, you argued one point of my argument but conveniently missed all the rest.

Anyway, most people have played Yasuo, i was a Yasuo main myself for a long time, so most people can see both sides of the coin AND STILL don't feel Yasuo is healthy.

In any case, for whatever reason, more people think that Yasuo is not healthy, than people who think he is. And because there is no objective measuring tool that ultimately decided if a champion is or is not unhealthy. It comes down to the people, and 'the people' overall, do not like Yasuo.

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=L44oY42b,comment-id=00010000000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-08-14T06:06:49.372+0000)
>
> Congrats, you argued one point of my argument but conveniently missed all the rest.
> 
> Anyway, most people have played Yasuo, i was a Yasuo main myself for a long time, so most people can see both sides of the coin AND STILL don't feel Yasuo is healthy.
> 
> In any case, for whatever reason, more people think that Yasuo is not healthy, than people who think he is. And because there is no objective measuring tool that ultimately decided if a champion is or is not unhealthy. It comes down to the people, and 'the people' overall, do not like Yasuo.

Rest of what argument, all i see is the drivel of a child

People "did not" like bard on release
People "did not" like taliyah wtf is your point 

----

“People fear what they don't understand and hate what they can't conquer.”

And thats exactly what this shit is

>Talon12 heres looking at you

Mmm Hmm.

I can agree with repeat VO, so just turn champ VO down.

____

My problem is with the people who complain because they got outplayed and have baby urges to cry because someone was better than them, not picking/noise/whatever, just people complaining about him being "op".

the only thing i find annoying is he can wind wall infront of a projectile and its still blocks it as in the projectiles about hit him he windwalls a mile infront of it and it diassapears... other than that if you know how to play against him hes manageable.

> [{quoted}](name=CHEESYLEEKS,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=L44oY42b,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-08-12T09:59:07.956+0000)
>
> the only thing i find annoying is he can wind wall infront of a projectile and its still blocks it as in the projectiles about hit him he windwalls a mile infront of it and it diassapears... other than that if you know how to play against him hes manageable.

then you need to learn the wall comes from his core, and moves to the outward position over .25 sec, then the remaining 3.75 it moves forwards 200 units slowly

> [{quoted}](name=CHEESYLEEKS,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=L44oY42b,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-08-12T09:59:07.956+0000)
>
> the only thing i find annoying is he can wind wall infront of a projectile and its still blocks it as in the projectiles about hit him he windwalls a mile infront of it and it diassapears

His w pushes from his body unlike say anivias wall which is created from that position

>if you know how to play against him hes manageable.

I think the word your looking for is laughable.

Every yas i see that doesn't end up getting fed somehow (seriously how does one feed a yas?) they just continually use E and kill themselves because they can't get back out.

what annoys me about yasuo is no matter how much you kill him early game. if you give him a tiny opening to farm a lane he will come back right away with just basic items and will still get 10+ kills by the end of the game even with 10+ deaths

> [{quoted}](name=dslxk,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=L44oY42b,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-08-13T03:34:27.527+0000)
>
> what annoys me about yasuo is no matter how much you kill him early game. if you give him a tiny opening to farm a lane he will come back right away with just basic items and will still get 10+ kills by the end of the game even with 10+ deaths

uh huh. Nice shit the average yasuo kda is around 6/8/5

he has one of the highest average deaths per games, his damage dealt averages under the overall average as well, his kills and assists sit around the middle, the only thing he really pulls ahead in is most cs per game, where he avarages as #3 highest cs at end of games
